hasDitaContent.@value: Both tapentadol and zolpidem can have CNS depressant effects, which might affect the ability to perform skilled tasks (see 'Drugs and Driving' in Guidance on Prescribing).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  tapentadol  and  zolpidem  can have CNS depressant effects, which might affect the ability to perform skilled tasks (see 'Drugs and Driving' in  Guidance on Prescribing ).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  tapentadol  and  zopiclone  can have CNS depressant effects, which might affect the ability to perform skilled tasks (see 'Drugs and Driving' in  Guidance on Prescribing ).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  tapentadol  and  zuclopenthixol  can have CNS depressant effects, which might affect the ability to perform skilled tasks (see 'Drugs and Driving' in  Guidance on Prescribing ).
